Original:
谷歌表示酒吧可能會關閉。它絕對沒有關閉。

Google said the bar may be closed.It is absolutely not closed.

The best diving bar in Taipei.The boss has a selected Buben whiskey (suitable for Taiwan), and his cocktails are also great.This place is very small, smelling like an old cigarette, reminding me of the bar in Tokyo.The boss is very friendly and will provide you with good and good -looking shots.

EN:
Very small and warm bar environment.The bar itself can only accommodate about 8-10 people.The bar is filled with games such as Connect 4. Drinking wheels, dice, DON'T BREAK The ICE and combat robot.

They have special cocktails, but you can also order cocktails outside the menu.Cocktail price 250NT+starts

EN: Without a menu, you can tell the bartender what kind of cocktail you want, what taste do you like, the sour is still sweet, the bartender will call a cup of cocktails that you expect.

Original:
這是第一次和朋友在台北過夜，我們發現了這個小而有趣的地方。
店主非常友善。  我們可以請歌曲一起唱。謝謝兄弟。

The owner is very friendly.We can invite songs to sing together.Thank you brother.

Original:
這個地方絕對是一顆寶石，毫無疑問是這座城市最好的酒吧。

只要含糊地描述您想要什麼樣的飲料，友善的老闆就會為您調製出獨特而令人難以置信的飲品。

我要了一杯辛辣、濃烈的雞尾酒，喝了一杯檸檬和胡椒雞尾酒，帶有一絲生薑的味道，我的女朋友要了椰子，但沒有喝馬里布，並得到了一杯附有椰子片的飲料，她堅稱這是她喝過的最好的飲料。

長長的酒吧、狹窄的空間和大量的遊戲，氣氛非常好。老闆有時看起來很安靜，但他很友善。另外你還可以抽煙！真是個飲酒狂歡的仙境！
EN:
This place is definitely a gem, and there is no doubt that it is the best bar for the city.

As long as you vaguely describe what kind of beverages you want, the friendly boss will make a unique and incredible drink for you.

I wanted a cup of spicy, strong cocktail, drank a glass of lemon and pepper cocktails, with a hint of ginger flavor. My girlfriend wanted coconut, but did not drink Marbu, and got a drink with coconut slices. She insisted that this was the best drink she had ever drank.

Long bars, narrow space and a lot of games, the atmosphere is very good.The boss sometimes looks quiet, but he is friendly.You can also smoke!It's a fairyland of drinking and carnival!

Original: 不錯的調酒師。裝飾很酷。他給了我們免費的再見鏡頭
EN: Good bartender.The decoration is cool.He gave us a free goodbye shot

EN: It's almost my favorite bar in Taipei.Old schools but new schools have no menu.Describe what you want, then bang!Have your own customized drink.
